devdoc.details: The governor contract for the system. Can create system pools (public pools shown on bitgems sites)      and user-owned pools (private pools not shown on the bitgem sites). All  privileged calls are made      through this contract.

addController(address).details: Add an address allowed to control this contract

createSystemPool(string,string,uint256,u.details: create a new system pool - called by sysadmins to add public pools

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: init this smart contract. Can only be called once. Sets the related contracts.

isController(address).details: Check if this address is a controller

relinquishControl().details: Remove the sender address from the list of controllers
